title: How to Block Ads on an Android

steps.title: Open the Google Chrome browser app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the Google Chrome browser app on your phone or tablet. Look on your home screen or in the app drawer for a colorful circle icon with a blue filled circle inside.

steps.title: Tap on the 3 vertical dots.
steps.content: Tap on the 3 vertical dots. This is in the top right corner.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is near the bottom.

steps.title: Tap Site settings.
steps.content: Tap Site settings . This is under "Advanced" near the bottom.

steps.title: Tap Ads.
steps.content: Tap Ads . This is near the middle, indicated with a white box.

steps.title: Tap the switch to turn it off .
steps.content: Tap the switch to turn it off . It will be gray and switched to the left when off. This will only block ads on sites that regularly show intrusive or misleading ads. Other ads will continue to show, as outlined by Google's Better Ad Standards [1] X Research source .

steps.title: Open the Firefox browser app on your Android phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the Firefox browser app on your Android phone or tablet. Look for a fox icon on your home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the 3 vertical dots.
steps.content: Tap the 3 vertical dots. This is in the top right corner.

steps.title: Tap Add-ons.
steps.content: Tap Add-ons . This is near the middle of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Browse Firefox's Recommended Extensions.
steps.content: Tap Browse Firefox's Recommended Extensions . This is at the bottom of your add-on list.

steps.title: Search for Adblock Plus.
steps.content: Search for Adblock Plus. Tap on the search bar at the top and type "adblock plus".

steps.title: Tap on Adblock Plus.
steps.content: Tap on Adblock Plus . It should be at the top with a stop-sign icon that says "ABP".

steps.title: Tap + Add to Firefox, then tap Add.
steps.content: Tap + Add to Firefox , then tap Add . This will add the extension to your Firefox browser app.

steps.title: Change the settings to block all ads.
steps.content: Change the settings to block all ads. By default, the ad blocker will still allow some non-intrusive ads. If you wish to block all ads, do the following: Tap on the 3 vertical dots in the top right corner of the Firefox browser. Tap Adblock Plus . Tap the switch off next to "Allow some non intrusive advertising". This is at the bottom.

steps.title: Install Wize AdBlock VPN.
steps.content: Install Wize AdBlock VPN. Go to Google Play Store, search for "wize adblock" and select "Wize AdBlock VPN", then tap Install . Wait a moment and tap Open . This app is free to download.

steps.title: Tap Activate.
steps.content: Tap Activate . It's below the gray power button. This will show a "Just one more step" prompt.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . This will prompt for a VPN connection request popup.

steps.title: Tap OK to confirm.
steps.content: Tap OK to confirm. This will show a popup showing the VPN is connected.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue .

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. This method should block most ads across websites, apps and games.
